title: How should I introduce myself and my YouTube channel? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you do not have an introduction video, You should make one that explains what your youtube channel is about.You can introduce yourself by subscribing to many others that you think will be interested in your channel. This will most likely be smaller channels that have around the same amount of subscribers like you.

Consider some key factors for your intro- People will watch your content and they don’t know you so, introduce in a way that makes them remember you. So other than by your name you can also share what you do and who you are so they have a basic idea. Don’t waste too much time on this and jump on the topic because people are there for some answers .
